strings.string: Guide the herd to the migration location.
In this long glacial winter, even the Woolly Mammoth has to migrate in search for food.

In this scenario you control a (b)herd of Mammoths(/b). You can select them, then issue various commands: • (b)Right click(/b) on (b)terrain(/b): go there (double right click to sprint). • (b)Right click(/b) on other (b)animals(/b): attack. Beware of predators.
Your herd has survived the march
